price: 94. Verkondig daarom openlijk, dat wat je opgedragen is en keer je af van afgodenaanbidders.
arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'daʿ bimā tu'maru wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-mush'rikīna
